lines.gurmukhi: ACl ACyd pRBu jw kY bs ibsÍ bl; qY ju rs bs kIey kvn pRkwr kY [

Unknown.translation: O friend! that Transcendent one who cannot be deceived by anyone. He is unbreakable who with His power has subdued the whole world, With what elixir have you been able to enamor Him?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: sKI pu`CdI hY nwiekw nUM Bwv jigAwsU pu`Cdw hY gurmuK nUM pRBU qwˆ ACl qy ACyd hY ijs dy ik bl dy v`s ivc swrw sMswr hY qUM jo aus nUM v`s kIqw hY auh iks qrHwˆ dy ikhVy rs nwl v`s kIqw hY?

lines.gurmukhi: isv snkwid bRhmwidk n DÎwn pwvY; qyro DÎwn DwrY AwlI kvn isMgwr kY [

Unknown.translation: O friend! He who has not even been realised by Sanak, Sananadan and those who have contemplated on Brahma, what embellishments and adornments have attracted Him to you?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iSv; snk; Awid qy bRhm Awid ijs nUM iDAwn ivc nhIˆ pw rhy hy sKI!qUM ikhVw iSMgwr kIqw hY ik auh qyrw iDAwn kr irhw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: ingm AsMK syK jMpq hY jw ko jsu; qyro js gwvq kvn aupkwr kY [

Unknown.translation: O friend! the Lord whose praise is being said in different words by Vedas and Sheshnag, what merits have made Him sing your praise?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: jpdy hn vyd qy Axigxq SySnwg ijs dw j`s auh qyrw j`s ikhVy aupkwr kr ky gw irhw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: sur nr nwQ jwih Kojq n Koj pwvY; Kojq iPrh qoih kvn ipAwr kY [647[

Unknown.translation: God who has not been realised by gods, man and Naths who have laboured untiringly, what type of love has made Him search you?  (647)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: dyvqy; mnu`K qy nwQ ijs nUM Kojdy hn; pr Koj nhIˆ pwauˆdy hy sKI! d`s qwˆ shI auh ikhVy ipAwr kr ky qYnUM Kojdw iPrdw hY ]647]
